elements.name: question1
elements.title: What counts as the external impression of a store?
elements.correctAnswer: Exterior signage, store fittings, shop windows, other exterior design elements, house facade

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Make a note of what belongs to the exterior labeling.
elements.correctAnswer: Company name (logo), store opening hours, possibly sector, possibly purchasing company, promotions and information on the shop window.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: What kind of shop window does your training company have? Describe it as precisely as possible in full sentences.
